Icon.instructions: The icon should be a Font Awesome icon. Class name such as fa-solid fa-shield-check, fa-solid fa-shield, fa-solid fa-shield-heart, or fa-solid fa-shield-halved. Find an icon that matches the guarantee. Do not repeat icons.

Body.value: Tell your family and friends about us after experiencing our fantastic work firsthand. We rely on word-of-mouth advertising to grow our business and are always happy to help.
